# Bug Report Template

## Introduction
Thank you for reporting a bug in TimeGuard-Office-Time-Tracker-PWA. This template will guide you through the process of submitting a bug report.

## Bug Information
### Description
Please provide a detailed description of the bug:
* What were you trying to do when the bug occurred?
* What did you expect to happen?
* What actually happened?
